title: 1D kinematics - acceleration of a fast fox

content.question: A fox runs in a straight line with motion represented by the graph of the foxâ€™s position as a function of time shown. Which of the following statements correctly compares the magnitudes of the acceleration, <math alttext="a sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="a sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, at times <math alttext="t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="t sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="a sub 1 is less than a sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="0 is less than a sub 1, which equals a sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="a sub 1 is greater than a sub 2, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="a sub 1 is greater than a sub 2, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="a sub 1 is greater than a sub 2, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
